subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Katie Smith and Taj McWilliams-Franklin helped Detroit take a step toward reclaiming the W.N.B.A. title by leading the Shock to a victory over San Antonio in Game 1 of the finals.
snippet: Katie Smith and Taj McWilliams-Franklin helped Detroit take a step toward reclaiming the W.N.B.A. title by leading the Shock to a victory over San Antonio in Game 1 of the finals.
